body: Too bad nexus and cafe are down... I wanna read the EN

Well, I don't know what to say...this shit is just fucked up, art is good, and the sex is also good. It'd have been amazing without the cucked part and the last few panels.. many people get off of rape and forced mind break, it's kinda sad but its still ok compared to a high school couple where the girl was abused like this and guy breaking down. This is really really sad,

This is a lot more fucked than just ntr. This is intentionally violent and emotionally jarring. If you have some weird mental thing where you like getting off to someone being cucked, that's your business, but this one is completely fucked
这个结局我没看懂啊，电视机坏了，地上有血迹，那几个混混躺在地上不动，难道是男主把他们都干了？但是又不太像，因为那几个混混身上没有血迹，好像单纯干虚脱了的样子。没明白结局是什么意思。

I don't mind NTR and the art is godly, but this shit is rage inducing since the rapists probably got away with it.

Anyway here is a link of the english translation and uncensored: https://hentainexus.com/view/7541
This is the most evil ntr yet
holyshit I need translate eng now :3

Man, that story was SO sad, rough and fucked up here, also can hit you hard. I can tell art is freaking hot. NTR, rape and drugs to the fullest here. Yes she was hard intoxicated by drugs by these guys and gang raped later, and she enjoyed it thoughtlessly because of high amount of drug she taken, well what a kind of story... ENDING is really interesting and... good? Gives us questions: Does she recovered from it? What happened to her later? I wonder if author will write sequel to this or just leaves us like that. Btw this squirt on page 48 was really arousing, but 49 wasn't with that hand... I think this would be something in anime adaptation by good studio.
Also that worst fucker(her "boyfriend"...) who arranged it all deserve to shot a bullet in the head lol. You can read this in english on hentai.cafe
